OOC: I am now playing Rat Trap as well as Tucson.

BIC: The best way to avo=
id a bad situation was to avoid it all together.  That's what Rat Trap's ph=
ilosophy was, until now.  For some really remote reason, he had to go into =
the dark tower.  Perhaps it was for a scrap of energon that he sensed, or s=
omething even more compelling than that.  In beast form, he could fit anywh=
ere that had a small crack or crevace.  There was none to speak of except f=
or a vent hole which he decides is the only way in.  He scrambles inside.

=
"I gotta be crazy, I gotta be outa my processor..  Why of all places would =
I be drawn to a dump like this?"

The rat thought quietly to himself.  Then=
 it hits him.  It wasn't energon but he had hoped he'd find that too.

"Wai=
t an astro sec...  Energy signatures...  Not Maximal, some preds, some cons=
, but there's somethn' else here....  Could - could it be? I gotta have a g=
litch someplace,this can't be right."  

He continues to follow the energy =
signature.  Of course he was honed in on Nightlights' and not Tucson, who w=
as now off line once again. It compells him although terrified of his surro=
undings, Rat Trap presses on.

He could sense that trying to make his press=
ense known around Nightlight may be dangerous.  He stops to think.

" Hmm, =
if I go directly for that signature I'm a trapped rat.  I better not go tha=
t way right now... But I can feel it, definitely an Autobot signature."  

=
He finds himself directly beneath the area where Tucson was being dragged o=
ff.  It confirms his findings.

" I was right.  Okay, I can do this, just f=
ollow those uglies under ground and hope they don't see me.  I gotta get wh=
eels back online somehow.  This ain't right, no way I'm gonna watch preds a=
nd cons take advantage of a good bunch of bots.  I gotta be outa my process=
or..."

He had heard Zarak speak of his battle station and puts two and two=
 together.  He waits for a moment, and as Tucson is dragged over the vent s=
haft, he scrambles quickly and hides within Tucson's helmet, still in his t=
iny beast form and balls up inside hoping not to be caught.  Thoughts racin=
g through his mind..

"This is crazy, this is completely insane, I can't be=
lieve I'm do'n thiiiis.  But I can't let those uglies win, I just can't.  D=
on't worry wheels, I'll get ya outa this bind, somehow..."

Even though Tuc=
son is off line, Rat Trap could sense something about the Autobot that was =
a bit different than the others.  He looks at him, and his physical form.

=
"You sure look familliar...  Wait a sec...  O - Optimus Prime...  Holy serv=
o scrap, no wonder why I had this strong urge ta risk my tail end by commn'=
 in here..  Ohh boy, I am sooo over my head."  

He backs further into Tucs=
on's helmet and tries to remain unseen.

e floor.

 ruckus, trying to target the Autobot through the smoke. 
> 
> "He is an Au=
tobot." said Cyclonus as he turned to fire on the fleeing Tuscon
>

p!" Scourge fretted as the smoke interfeared with his sensors.

k a moment for thier optics and sensors to adjust, and by then the Autobot =
was already on the move. Even as Tuscon ran down on fuel the trio was in pu=
rsuit.

ine shuts

were a Maximal or an Autobot.

> As Tuscon ran out of power an=
d came to a stop, a door slid open. "Yes Autobot, she is here, as are other=
s." said a voice from the shadowed interior of the room, "and now so are yo=
u."
>

son and he Used a stunned gun againts Him, then

ansformn Him to his Robot mode and once he was in

d him thignly. 
> 
> As Darkhawk finished his work, a figure moved from the=
 room, the ambient light finally piercing the shadows as it stepped into th=
e hall to reveal the form of the head master unit called Zarak.
> 
> He cas=
ually stepped forward and leaned over the depowered and now stunned form of=
 Tuscon, "We have use for one like you." He ran a scanner over Tuscon's fra=
me "Yes, one so like the old Prime."
> 
> "You see it don't you Autobot?" Z=
arak said, speaking to the inert form of Tuscon. "Our scanners also reveale=
d something else." Zarak straightened as he changed the feed of his scanner=
 to link with the base scanners, "There is a minion floating over the old M=
aximal base, quite possibly attacking it."
> 
> Zarak chuckled, "With it th=
ere, all your Autobot and Maximal friends are no doubt rushing to get there=
 to defend that pitiful piece of technology, possibly even some of the ones=
 defending the ark." Zarak's optics widened in mock surprise, "I'm surprise=
d you didn't get the call."
> 
> Zarak smiled again, mockingly, derisively,=
 "And now we have you, so much like the old Prime and we have a lightly def=
ended Ark and a Matrix waiting for us to plunder."
> 
> "MWHAHAHAHAaaa!"
> =

> "Yes, we have a use for him." Zarak said as he turned to look at Darkhaw=
k, "Bring him to my battle station, we have a treasure that awaits us!"

> OOC: I am assuming that Tuscon is indeed knocked out. Please keep in mind=
